TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDsaOpenSsl extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa
Public NotInheritable Class ECDsaOpenSsl Inherits ECDsa
public ref class ECDsaOpenSsl sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::ECDsa

summary.span: 提供由 OpenSSL 支持的椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 的实现。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) backed by OpenSSL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当使用系统 OpenSSL 库执行平台互操作时，才应直接使用此类。This class should only be used directly when doing platform interop with the system OpenSSL library. 当不需要平台互操作时，应使用 工厂方法，而不是特定的派生实现。When platform interop is not needed, you should use the factory methods instead of a specific derived implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为521，并且当需要某个键时，保存的大小用于标识目标曲线。This constructor sets the property to 521 and when a key is needed the saved size is used to identify the target curve. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数中的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

span.span: The size of the key.

span.span: Valid key sizes are 256, 384, and 521 bits.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified target key size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为提供的值，并且当需要某个键时，保存的大小用于标识目标曲线。This constructor sets the property to the provided value and when a key is needed the saved size is used to identify the target curve. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数中的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > OpenSSL 支持在同一个进程中加载多个库版本。OpenSSL supports multiple library versions being loaded within the same process. > 在调用此构造函数之前，请验证指针值是否来自此类使用的相同版本的 OpenSSL，有关详细信息，请参阅 。Before calling this constructor verify your pointer value came from the same version of OpenSSL that this class uses, see for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此方法的每个调用都会产生一个新的 对象及其生存期。Each call to this method produces a new object with its own lifetime. 此方法返回的对象可以安全地使用，即使在此 实例被释放后也是如此。The objects returned by this method can safely be used even after this instance has been disposed.

span.span: The curve parameters.

summary.span: 将此实例的当前密钥替换为使用指定密钥参数的密钥。

span.span: Replaces the current key for this instance with one using the specified key parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `parameters` 仅包含 ，则只导入一个公钥。If `parameters` contains only , only a public key is imported. 如果 `parameters` 也包含 ，则将导入完整密钥对。If `parameters` also contains , a full key pair is imported. "" 字段指定要导入的曲线类型。The field specifies the type of the curve to import.

span.span: does not contain valid values.

summary.span: 获取或设置非对称算法所用密钥模块的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.

value.span: 非对称算法所用密钥模块的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为其当前值，则不会产生任何效果。Setting this property to its current value has no visible effect. 如果将此属性设置为新的合法值，则将放弃当前密钥，但会推迟创建新密钥，直到需要一个密钥。Setting this property to a new legal value discards the current key, but defers creation of a new key until one is needed. 由于键大小不唯一标识椭圆曲线，因此不建议使用属性 setter。Because key sizes do not uniquely identify elliptic curves, the use of the property setter is discouraged. 若要生成特定曲线上的新键，请使用 方法。To generate a new key on a specific curve, use the method.

span.span: is not permitted by .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LegalKeySizes As KeySizes()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ LegalKeySizes { cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 属性资源库支持的密钥大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets the key sizes, in bits, that are supported by the property setter.

value.span: 一个数组，该数组包含 属性 setter 支持的密钥大小。

span.span: An array that contains the key sizes supported by the property setter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在椭圆曲线加密（ECC）中，密钥大小不是密钥生成过程中的唯一输入，它派生自特定椭圆曲线的曲线参数。In Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) the key size is not the only input into the key generation process, it is derived from the curve parameters for a specific elliptic curve. 此属性仅报告三个合法密钥大小：256、384和521位。This property reports only three legal key sizes: 256, 384, and 521 bits. 当密钥大小仅用作密钥生成的基础时，支持的大小将映射到命名曲线 secp256r1 （又称 NIST P-256）、secp384r1 （又称 NIST P-384）和 secp521r1 （又称 NIST P-521）。When the key size is used alone as a basis for key generation, the supported sizes map to the named curves secp256r1 (aka NIST P-256), secp384r1 (aka NIST P-384), and secp521r1 (aka NIST P-521).
